abstract: A look at Danfung Dennis's documentary about a Marine's return from the war in Afghanistan.
snippet: A look at Danfung Dennis's documentary about a Marine's return from the war in Afghanistan.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: "Hell and Back Again," a visceral documentary by Danfung Dennis about the war in Afghanistan, opens in Manhattan on Wednesday. In his review for The New York Times, Neil Genzlinger writes that the film's "unvarnished and ambiguous" nature makes it more disturbing than some of the more prepackaged and sanitized efforts to relay the graphic realities of war.

headline.main: A Film's Clear-Eyed Look at the War in Afghanistan
